definitions.definition: A black person ; a person of black African descent.

subdefinitions.definition: A person of black African descent who behaves badly or unconventionally ( whether the speaker approves or disapproves ) .

definitions.label_groups: offensive , ethnic slur , vulgar , see usage notes

definitions.definition: A member of any typically dark -skinned people ( now especially in combinations like prairie nigger or sand nigger ) .
definitions.label_groups: offensive , ethnic slur , vulgar , see usage notes

definitions.definition: A friend , particularly a fellow black person ( often as an informal term of address ) .
A person of any kind ( particularly as a term of abuse ).
definitions.label_groups: figurative , especially African-American Vernacular , otherwise offensive

definitions.definition: A member of a group that is oppressed or marginalized in the manner of black people.

subdefinitions.definition: Any member of species Girella tricuspidata ( luderick ).
A dark brown nymphalid butterfly, Orsotriaena medus , of south Asia, southeast Asia, and Australia.
A kind of sea cucumber , Holothuria forskali , the cotton-spinner .
The larva of the turnip sawfly , an agricultural pest.

definitions.definition: An impurity in the covering of an electrical conductor which serves to make a partial short circuit , and thus becomes sufficiently heated to burn and destroy the insulation .
A strong iron-bound timber with sharp teeth or spikes protruding from its front face, forming part of the machinery of a sawmill , and used in canting logs , etc.
A steam - capstan on some Mississippi river boats, used to haul the boat over bars and snags by a rope fastened to a tree on the bank.
A black screen used in conjunction with the camera to block light or produce special lighting effects.

main_definition: ( offensive , ethnic slur , vulgar , see usage notes ) A black person ; a person of black African descent.
secondary_definitions: ( offensive , ethnic slur , vulgar , see usage notes ) A member of any typically dark -skinned people ( now especially in combinations like prairie nigger or sand nigger ) .
( African-American Vernacular ) A friend , particularly a fellow black person ( often as an informal term of address ) .
( figurative , especially African-American Vernacular , otherwise offensive ) A person of any kind ( particularly as a term of abuse ).
( especially in comparisons , now offensive ) A member of a group that is oppressed or marginalized in the manner of black people.
( now offensive ) Any of various dark animals:

( archaic , electrical ) An impurity in the covering of an electrical conductor which serves to make a partial short circuit , and thus becomes sufficiently heated to burn and destroy the insulation .
( archaic ) A strong iron-bound timber with sharp teeth or spikes protruding from its front face, forming part of the machinery of a sawmill , and used in canting logs , etc.
( archaic , US ) A steam - capstan on some Mississippi river boats, used to haul the boat over bars and snags by a rope fastened to a tree on the bank.
( film , dated ) A black screen used in conjunction with the camera to block light or produce special lighting effects.
